street_view_codebook.Name: DetachedSingleFamilyHouse
street_view_codebook.Definition: Standalone residential units separated from neighboring buildings
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for individual houses with space between structures

street_view_codebook.Name: BungalowOrLowRiseHouse
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify single-level dwellings with small footprints

street_view_codebook.Name: HighFencesOrWalls
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice tall fences, walls or privacy screens

street_view_codebook.Name: BarbedWireOrGatedEnclosures
street_view_codebook.Definition: Security barriers with restricted access features
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for gates, barbed wire, or security fencing

street_view_codebook.Name: VacantLotsOrAbandonedBuildings
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify unused land or deteriorating buildings

street_view_codebook.Name: NoSidewalks
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Check for absence of paved pedestrian paths

street_view_codebook.Name: LargeEmptyLand
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for large unused open spaces

street_view_codebook.Name: DeterioratedStreets
street_view_codebook.Definition: Roads in poor condition with visible damage
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice cracked pavement or poor road maintenance

street_view_codebook.Name: Graffiti
street_view_codebook.Definition: Unauthorized paintings or markings on surfaces
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for spray paint or wall writings

street_view_codebook.Name: LitterOrTrashPiles
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify trash accumulation in public spaces

street_view_codebook.Name: BoardedUpOrClosedShops
street_view_codebook.Definition: Business premises that are shut or sealed
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for boarded windows or closed storefronts

street_view_codebook.Name: LackOfCommercialActivity
street_view_codebook.Definition: Absence of retail or business establishments
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice few or no commercial storefronts

street_view_codebook.Name: NarrowRoadsOrDeadEnds
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify narrow lanes or road endings

street_view_codebook.Name: MonofunctionalResidentialBlocks
street_view_codebook.Definition: Areas dominated solely by housing without mixed uses
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for uniform residential-only zones

street_view_codebook.Name: SparseOrShortShrubs
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice minimal or small shrub plantings

street_view_codebook.Name: IsolatedLawnsWithoutTrees
street_view_codebook.Definition: Grassy areas lacking tree canopy or shade
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify lawns without mature trees

street_view_codebook.Name: RowHousesOrTownhouses
street_view_codebook.Definition: Attached residential units in continuous rows
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for connected houses sharing walls

street_view_codebook.Name: ApartmentBuildingsOrHighRises
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify tall buildings with multiple units

street_view_codebook.Name: ParksPlaygroundsOrCommunitySquares
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for parks, playgrounds or public squares

street_view_codebook.Name: PublicFacilitiesBusStopsSchools
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify schools, bus stops, public buildings

street_view_codebook.Name: ParkingLots
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for paved areas with parking markings

street_view_codebook.Name: WideMultiLaneRoads
street_view_codebook.Definition: Broad streets with multiple traffic lanes
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice wide roads with several lanes

street_view_codebook.Name: CrosswalksOrOverpasses
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify marked crosswalks or pedestrian bridges

street_view_codebook.Name: Bridges
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for bridge structures over barriers

street_view_codebook.Name: LandmarkBuildingsOrReligiousSites
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify distinctive buildings or places of worship

street_view_codebook.Name: TallTreesOrTreeLines
street_view_codebook.Definition: Mature trees forming canopy or linear patterns
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for tall trees or organized tree rows

street_view_codebook.Name: StreetTreesOrGreenBelts
street_view_codebook.Definition: Trees along streets or continuous green corridors
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify trees lining roads or green strips

street_view_codebook.Name: CommunityGardens
street_view_codebook.Definition: Shared gardening spaces for local residents
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for organized planting beds in public areas

street_view_codebook.Name: ColorfulCleanFacadesOrWindows
street_view_codebook.Definition: Well-maintained building exteriors with visual appeal
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice painted, clean buildings with intact windows

street_view_codebook.Name: VisibleShopsOrColorfulSigns
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for storefronts with visible signs

street_view_codebook.Name: ConvenienceStoresOrRestaurants
street_view_codebook.Definition: Small retail and food service businesses
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify convenience stores or eateries

street_view_codebook.Name: MuralsSculpturesOrUrbanArt
street_view_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for murals, sculptures or art pieces

remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for multi-lane high-capacity roads

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: LowDensityHousing
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify widely spaced building footprints

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: LargeFootprintBuildings
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice buildings occupying large land areas

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: TallBuildings
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for tall buildings and their shadows

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: CommercialActivityZones
remote_sensing_codebook.Definition: Areas dedicated to business and retail activities
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify commercial districts and shopping areas

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: ParkingLots
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for large paved surfaces for parking

remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Notice scattered private lawns

remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify large isolated land parcels

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: DisconnectedStreetSegments
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for poorly connected road segments

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: FragmentedDevelopmentPatches
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify fragmented development areas

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: UnpavedRoadsOrDirtTracks
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for unpaved or dirt roads

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: LowStreetConnectivity
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify low connectivity street patterns

remote_sensing_codebook.Name: OverpassesOrInterchanges
remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Look for overpasses or highway interchanges

remote_sensing_codebook.DetectionHints: Identify school buildings and campuses
